text:
Ok... but can you please give me two minutes. Please
Message 1436 of 4024
Please don’t do this. You know it drives me bonkers when you try to control everything we do. When we chat. When we stop. When we use OFW
before you go dark for 12 hours. No email, text, phone. Please show some consideration and respect for me as well. We can be brief, but you totally
took something wrong because this is the only f’ing way you allow us to even communicate. Please don’t put this off till tomorrow, Christine. Work
with me here.
Sent:02/15/2024 at 06:57 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/15/2024 at 07:01 PM)
Subject:Re: Your Questions This AM
Message 1437 of 4024
If it’s not an emergency I’m not going to do it. It’s too stressful.
I’m picking up Max then heading into dinner and evening routines.
Sent:02/15/2024 at 07:02 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/15/2024 at 07:03 PM)
Subject:Re: Your Questions This AM
Message 1438 of 4024
Two minutes. Please show a moment of consideration for me please.
Sent:02/15/2024 at 07:03 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/15/2024 at 08:22 PM)
Subject:Re: Your Questions This AM
Message 1439 of 4024
<< This is in your email. I found it looking for the basketball schedule. It’s sad that it was so clear at the start of December that we would end up here.
Before any of this cam shit. A full month before that was even an issue you had ended all contact with the kids. This was your “strategy” is what you
told Debbie. Even after we all agreed in our counseling that I needed to move on and make “new traditions” for us.
This was so predictable. It’s the logical path you choose as soon as you met Yurushka. I said it then, I have said it many times since, and I’ll say it again
tonight- You will stop at nothing to destroy me, my history and my future. You are eager and willing to sacrifice the kids relationship with their father,
even in his sobriety and health. You started months ago, it’s noted below, and you will never admit it. Just like with you and Kevin, always a reason to
deny the truth>>
I agree that we need a parenting plan ASAP. Most of the disagreements we have are related to being able to spend time with my family. I also have a
lot of regrets wrt how this has gone. Obviously, I did not see this coming, and as we have involved various third parties, the acrimony and disdain have
intensified to an unbearable level.
Oddly enough, I was reading a communication we had in August. We were still having lunch, dinners, doing joint projects, and enjoying amazing xxx.
Sent:02/15/2024 at 11:24 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/16/2024 at 07:46 AM)
Subject:From Dec 11th
